title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - v2.0
description: Revised gathering and documentation of requirements for the TeamMoodAnalyzer tool, including features, user stories, and acceptance criteria. Focus on creating a comprehensive, flexible, and scalable system that effectively gauges team morale and suggests activities or interventions to improve team spirit.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and considerations for scalability, maintainability, and security.

title: Design Database Schema for TeamMoodAnalyzer
description: Design the database schema to store team member data, mood data, activity/intervention data, and related metadata. Consider performance, scalability, and security implications.

title: Design User Interface for TeamMoodAnalyzer
description:
Design the user interface for team members to input mood data and view suggested activities/interventions. The UI should be intuitive, user-friendly, accessible, and engaging. Incorporate gamification elements to encourage participation and engagement, focusing on providing a seamless experience that aligns with the TeamMoodAnalyzer project goals. Consider the following points:
1. Keep design consistent with the Design System Architecture (dependency)
2. Ensure compatibility across various platforms (desktop, mobile, web)
3. Implement feedback mechanism for user suggestions and bug reports
4. Prioritize security measures to protect user data
5. Consider integrating progress tracking features and personalization options
6. Collaborate with other team members to ensure the UI design complements the overall system functionality

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Implement backend services for data storage, mood analysis, and activity/intervention suggestion.

title: Implement Frontend Application
description: Implement the frontend application for team members to input mood data and view suggested activities/interventions.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up CI/CD pipelines for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Write user documentation for team members on how to use the TeamMoodAnalyzer tool.

title: Perform Security Audit
description: Perform a security audit on the application to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing
description: Conduct user acceptance testing with a pilot group of team members to validate the application meets requirements.
